name: Go house!
description:
Play "Go House!". Go House is a 2D game with enemies, the SLIMES. But you have to go a long way back home so there are so many slimes here.  Are you going to make it back home?

New version of Go House V 1.3!

3 new difficulties:

-Easy;

-Medium;

-Hard.

The difficulty change the number of slimes. To have more fun with Go House!
